mapper.insert: MERGE INTO PERSON p USING (SELECT #{person_id} AS person_id FROM DUAL) src ON (p.person_id = src.person_id) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET p.person_name = #{person_name}, p.biography = #{biography}, p.profile_path = #{profile_path} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (person_id, person_name, biography, profile_path) VALUES (#{person_id}, #{person_name}, #{biography}, #{profile_path})
